page.about-koji.label: page.build-versions.description
About this Koji: Verify deployment and access build logs for any version of your template. A new template version is automatically built and deployed when you publish your project from the Koji editor or push changes to master on your project's remote repository. {{link}}

page.about-koji.label: page.koji-creator-view.description
About this Koji: Monitor how this Koji is performing and keep it up to date. You can review the summary information and access more detailed data and settings. {{link}}

page.about-koji.label: container.ci-status.description
About this Koji: Status of the most recent build and deployment of this Koji.

page.about-koji.label: container.git-status.description
About this Koji: Recent commits to this Koji's source code repository on Git.

page.about-koji.label: container.transactions-widget-koji.description
About this Koji: Purchase and payment statistics for this Koji.

page.about-koji.label: action.manage-domains.description
About this Koji: Customize the web addresses for this Koji.

page.about-koji.label: action.manage-plugins.description
About this Koji: Add dynamic services, like Google Analytics.

page.about-koji.label: action.open-admin.description
About this Koji: Use features in this Koji that only you can see.

page.about-koji.label: action.open-editor.description
About this Koji: Edit this Koji's source code in the web editor.

page.about-koji.label: action.set-magic-link.description
About this Koji: Point your custom `koji.to` link to this Koji.

page.about-koji.label: action.share.description
About this Koji: Post this Koji on your social channels.

page.about-koji.label: action.view-database.description
About this Koji: View, download, or delete data collected in this Koji's database.

page.about-koji.label: action.view-source.description
About this Koji: Explore this Koji's source code in read-only mode.
